comments.text:
I have to say I've been highly disappointed in the Gordon Ramsay Frozen dishes you buy at the grocery store... I realize that Frozen dishes are nowhere near as good as freshly cooked and prepared and served food, but still I would truly expected Gordon Ramsay frozen food to be better than the other frozen food, and out of the five or six entrees I've tried, NONE of them where as good as the competitors.

I have no idea if he actually made the recipe and verify the taste of the Frozen items or not, but I did expect anything that had his name and face on it, to be at least as good as the competition, if not better.

And every one of them so far have been a large disappointment. The last one I tried was the "lasagna".

comments.author: @klaxoncow
comments.text:
Gordon has a pop at the guy suggesting that, not being a main meal (which it isn't), you'd perhaps traditionally eat it like you might eat a hot dog.

Actually, Gordon shouldn't have told him off, as that's a really good comparison.

Because, no, no-one's having a sausage roll as a main meal. But you might grab one, as a quick snack, while you're out and about - exactly like you might grab a hot dog, sure.

Like, a hot dog is a sausage in a bread roll, while a sausage roll is a sausage in a puff pastry tube.

Sorry, Gordon, but apologise to that man, as that's a really good comparison to explain, in American terms, how you'd eat a sausage roll and what type of meal it is.

Among Us
Article Talk
Language
Watch
View source
Among Us is a 2018 online multiplayer social deduction game developed and published by American game studio Innersloth. The game was inspired by the party game Mafia and the science fiction horror film The Thing. The game allows for cross-platform play; it was released on iOS and Android devices in June 2018 and on Windows later that year in November. It was ported to the Nintendo Switch in December 2020 and on the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S in December 2021. A virtual reality adaptation, Among Us VR, was released on November 10, 2022.

Among Us
Cartoon astronauts in colored spacesuits floating through space. A bright light and many stars are visible behind them. In front of them are the words "Among Us", with the "A" replaced by an astronaut.

Among Us takes place in space-themed settings where players are colorful, armless cartoon astronauts. Each player takes on one of two roles: most are Crewmates, but a small number are Impostors. Crewmates work to complete assigned tasks in the game while identifying and voting out suspected Impostors (who appear identical to Crewmates) using social deduction, while Impostors have the objective of killing the Crewmates.

While the game was initially released in 2018 to little mainstream attention, it received a massive rise in popularity in 2020 due to many Twitch streamers and YouTubers playing it during the COVID-19 pandemic. It received favorable reviews from critics for fun and entertaining gameplay. The game and its stylized characters have been the subject of various internet memes.

comments.text:
You gotta understand how good a sausage roll is, it is the best thing you could ever have, hot or cold with a nice flakey puff pastry layer. If you have no idea what a sausage roll is or not ever had one, it is the best thing you've ever had and you're missing out.

A good sausage roll needs good flavourful sausage meat that's perfectly seasoned, the puff pastry needs to be a light fluffy texture 2ith many visible layers that crackles and flakes really easily.
